monitoring-subtitle: Track site latency, rendering health, infrastructure load, and job throughput across the entire network in real time.
monitoring-overview-desc: Live indicators summarising cluster latency and rendering health.
monitoring-overview-empty: No monitoring data is available yet. Configure probes to unlock this dashboard.
monitoring-card-local-latency-hint: Measured from this server to each site entry point.
monitoring-card-remote-latency-hint: Aggregated external probes from remote monitoring points.
monitoring-card-ttfb-hint: Time to first byte sampled from field UX metrics.
monitoring-card-stress-hint: Composite score that blends latency, slow sites, CPU, and memory pressure.
monitoring-speed-desc: Compare local probe latency with external checkpoints and uptime quality.
monitoring-speed-empty: No latency probes have reported yet.
monitoring-ux-desc: Web vitals collected from field data or synthetic experience runs.
monitoring-ux-empty: No UX metrics detected. Connect RUM or synthetic monitoring sources.
monitoring-cms-desc: Observe rendering, data access, caching, and overall generation trends.
monitoring-cms-render-hint: Estimated time spent on theme rendering after the request enters the view layer.
monitoring-cms-db-hint: Measured via queue collectors or DB profiler hooks when enabled.
monitoring-cms-io-hint: Tracks disk reads and writes across caches and content storage when instruments are active.
monitoring-cms-cache-hint: Requires cache metrics to be forwarded by the configured accelerator.
monitoring-cms-generation-hint: Total time from request start to controller finish for this snapshot.
monitoring-resources-desc: Real-time CPU, memory, disk, and network footprint for the host.
monitoring-resources-empty: Resource metrics could not be sampled on this host.
monitoring-resource-cpu-hint: Compare the one-minute load to core capacity to detect saturation.
monitoring-resource-memory-hint: Calculated using MemTotal and MemAvailable from /proc/meminfo.
monitoring-resource-disk-hint: Tracks used space within the CMS root filesystem.
monitoring-resource-network-hint: Total RX/TX bytes since boot across non-loopback interfaces.
monitoring-queue-desc: Pending jobs, ageing, and execution duration per queue.
monitoring-schedule-desc: Track cron-style jobs, their cadence, and average run durations.
monitoring-schedule-empty: No scheduled tasks have been recorded yet.
monitoring-cluster-desc: Macro-level impact across every managed site.
monitoring-cluster-stress-hint: Use this gauge to decide when to scale horizontally or tune caching.
monitoring-alerts-desc: Actionable findings generated from the current snapshot.
monitoring-alerts-empty: Everything looks healthy. No alerts fired in this snapshot.
monitoring-alert-high-stress-body: Latency and host pressure are above safe limits. Scale resources or shed load immediately.
monitoring-alert-moderate-stress-body: Watch latency and resource usage closely. Consider enabling additional caching or workers.
monitoring-alert-queue-blocked-body: Pending jobs are ageing beyond the SLA. Inspect workers and unblock the queue.
monitoring-alert-queue-delayed-body: Increase worker capacity or review job duration before a backlog forms.
monitoring-alert-slow-site-body: Remote latency breached the slow threshold. Investigate template hot paths or upstream latency.
monitoring-alert-cls-body: Cumulative Layout Shift exceeds 0.25. Optimise the critical rendering path to stabilise the viewport.
